settings.title: Configurações
settings.MailAuxiliaryUserAccountsEnabled: Permitir que os usuários adicionem outras contas IMAP
settings.ACLs: Send email to involved users of a calendar/address book
settings.Folders: Send email on the creation of a calendar/address book
settings.Email: send email-based alarm on events and tasks
settings.VirtualHost: Make SOGo reachable only from this domain (FQDN)
settings.WOWorkersCount: Number of workers (one per activesync client connected)
settings.SOGoInternalSyncInterval: maximum time in second before to checks after changes
settings.settings_updated_ok: The settings have been well updated
settings.settings_updated_error: The settings have not well updated

validation.not_valid_username: Este não é um nome de usuário válido
validation.valid_hostname_fqdn_1_922337203685477580: This is not a valid FQDN(something like domain.org)
validation.Bad_Notification_Element: Esta não é uma boa configuração de notificação
